mapper.select: select a.pcode, pname, pprice, dept2no, optcolor, optname, iloc, itype from product a, poption b, img c where a.pcode=b.pcode and a.pcode=c.pcode and dept2no=22 and itype='thumb' and iloc like '%0' and optcolor=#{optcolor} and rownum <= 15

select a.pcode, pname, pprice, dept2no, optcolor, optname, iloc, itype from product a, poption b, img c where a.pcode=b.pcode and a.pcode=c.pcode and dept2no=24 and itype='thumb' and iloc like '%0' and optcolor=#{optcolor} and rownum <= 15

select a.pcode, pname, pprice, dept2no, ptype, optcolor, optname, iloc, itype from product a, poption b, img c where a.pcode=b.pcode and a.pcode=c.pcode and dept2no=21 and itype='thumb' and optcolor=#{optcolor} and rownum <= 15
mapper.insert: insert into result(rid, result_img, lip, lip_pcode, lip_opt, blush, blush_pcode, blush_opt, face, face_pcode, face_opt) values (#{rid},#{result_img}, #{lip}, #{lip_pcode}, #{lip_opt}, #{blush}, #{blush_pcode}, #{blush_opt}, #{face}, #{face_pcode}, #{face_opt})
